mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, board.* from (select a.ORD_DETAIL_NUM,a.MEM_EMAIL,a.CM_NUM,a.ORD_BUNDLE_NUM,a.ORD_QUANTITY,a.ORD_STATUS,a.ORD_ADD1,a.ORD_ADD2,a.ORD_PHONE,a.ORD_REQUEST,b.PRD_NAME,c.sto_name from order_tb a left join product_tb b on a.prd_code=b.prd_code left join store_tb c on b.sto_num = c.sto_num order by ORD_BUNDLE_NUM) board) where (rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}) and (MEM_EMAIL =#{memEmail})
select count(*) from review_tb where MEM_EMAIL=#{memEmail}
